div.p: We asked some of our clients if they’d be happy to talk about their experiences with EXO and Axsys. Below you'll find their impressions as reported by an independent consultant we engaged to interview representatives of the organisations, as well as case studies prepared by MYOB.
Juicy Isle produces an extensive range of quality chilled, freshly squeezed and long life fruit juices, as well as handling distribution for names such as Nestlé, Cadbury Schweppes, and Smiths.

Offroad Trucks Australia imports special-purpose European trucks. Finding a system to support the added accounting burden created by their import activities unfortunately proved easier than finding good support for the system.

div.a: When a great system is not enough...

div.p: Founded in the Riverland of South Australia in the early 1930s, Nippy’s is one of those great Australian companies still doing what it does best – delivering fresh produce to the people of Australia.

div.a: “My positive experience with EXO is due to Jason Ransley and the Axsys team.”

div.p: Finding a system to adequately handle job costing across their commercial construction, maintenance, and minor works activities, had proven a real time-eater for Cunic Constructions.

div.a: “Every day for the first twelve months I found myself saying, ‘I love this!’”

div.p: Degree C, a wholly owned subsidiary of Fairbrother Pty Ltd, specialises in mechanical services contracting, refrigeration, heating, ventilation and air conditioning technologies, electrical contracting and metal fabrication.

div.a: “The flexibility of EXO is what drew us initially.”
